attributes.action: prevent mortgage providers foreclosing on mortgages where the borrower is in default as a result of losing his/her job or business within the last year .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the Government plans to help people keep their homes there seems to be nothing immediately available to help someone who is now jobless or lost their business to stay in their homes while they find employment . Lenders should not be allowed to foreclose on a mortgage for at least nine months from the date that they would otherwise be able to do so.That would at least give time for any government support schemes to become operative and maybe for the job market to start picking up .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
